snippet.title: Love at The Milky Way Diner - Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
Trailer video for visual novel game Love at The Milky Way Diner.
A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.

Love At The Milky Way Diner is Clumsy Cat Studio’s debut production. We are a strong but mighty team of two, with big dreams of launching our own video game studio. 

If you like the trailer please try our demo and support us on Kickstarter!
Back us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/330388878/love-at-the-milky-way-diner-a-cooking-dating-sim
Download Demo: https://clumsycatstudio.itch.io/love-at-the-milky-way-diner
.
.
.
200 years after first contact, humanity is still trying to find their  place in a galaxy full of far more advanced and established species. 

One such human, our protagonist, has recently been laid off from their corporate job on Mars when news reaches them; their distant aunt Cassiopia has passed away suddenly, and she would like one of her relatives to take over her restaurant on the distant deep space station Hesperides. 

The protagonist decides to take a leap of faith. They may have never left their home start system of Helios, but surely there must be something (or maybe someone) better out there waiting for them. 

When they reach the station they find themselves welcomed by a vibrant, multi-species community of eccentric individuals who are only too happy to welcome the new owner of their favorite place to eat.

Love at the Milky Way Diner is a game about cultural exchange through food, building community, and finding love in the process.
